com.vectorprint.report

Interface ReportGenerator<RD extends ReportDataHolder>

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    BaseReportGenerator

    public interface ReportGenerator<RD extends ReportDataHolder>
    Implementers will be responsible for writing a report to an OutputStream
    Author:
    Eduard Drenth at VectorPrint.nl
    See Also:
    DataCollector

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      boolean continueOnDataCollectionMessages(DataCollectionMessages messages, com.itextpdf.text.Document document)
      handle messages set in the data collection phase, will be called prior to building the report.
      int generate(RD data, OutputStream outputStream)
      generate a report
      void processData(RD data)
      process data to generate a report, the suggested way is to look for Element and DataType annotations on the peaces of data and create and style report parts accordingly.

    • Method Detail

      • generate

        int generate(RD data,
           OutputStream outputStream)
             throws com.vectorprint.VectorPrintException
        generate a report
        Parameters:
        data -
        outputStream -
        Returns:
        0 when successful
        Throws:
        com.vectorprint.VectorPrintException

      • continueOnDataCollectionMessages

        boolean continueOnDataCollectionMessages(DataCollectionMessages messages,
                                       com.itextpdf.text.Document document)
                                         throws com.vectorprint.VectorPrintException
        handle messages set in the data collection phase, will be called prior to building the report.
        Parameters:
        messages -
        document - the value of document
        Returns:
        a value of true means the messages set by the DataCollector are dealt with, the report will be generated in this case, a value of false will cause the report to fail
        Throws:
        com.vectorprint.VectorPrintException

      • processData

        void processData(RD data)
                 throws com.vectorprint.VectorPrintException,
                        com.itextpdf.text.DocumentException
        process data to generate a report, the suggested way is to look for Element and DataType annotations on the peaces of data and create and style report parts accordingly.
        Parameters:
        data -
        Throws:
        com.vectorprint.VectorPrintException
        com.itextpdf.text.DocumentException
        See Also:
        ReportDataHolderImpl, DataCollectorImpl
